%APPENDIX B – ABET FACULTY VITAE
%The following is a suggested format for the faculty vitae.  A different format may be used if all identified content areas are included in a format that is consistent for all vitae within the Self-Study Report.  Maximum length is three pages per vita.

%Vitae must be readily readable and digitally accessible with one-inch or larger margins, six or fewer lines of text per inch, and a readable font such as Arial (not Arial Narrow), Courier New, or Palatino Linotype at a font size of 10 points or larger; Times New Roman at a font size of 11 points or larger; or Computer Modern family of fonts at a font size of 11 points or larger.

%Required Content Areas

%Name 

%Education – degree, discipline, institution, year

%Academic and Professional Experience – institution or entity, rank (if relevant), title, when (e.g., 2002-2007), full-time or part-time

%Professional credentials, certifications, or licensing

%Professional development activities (includes conference attendance)

%Contributions to the discipline (e.g., service, publications or presentations)

\documentclass[letterpaper,11pt,english]{curve}

% Uncomment to enable Chinese; needs XeLaTeX
% \usepackage{ctex}

% Default biblatex style used for the publication list is APA6. If you wish to use a different style or pass other options to biblatex you can change them here. 
\PassOptionsToPackage{style=ieee,sorting=ydnt,uniquename=init,defernumbers=true,giveninits=true,maxnames=20,eprint=false,isbn=false}{biblatex}

% Most commands and style definitions are in settings.sty.
\usepackage{settings}

%% Add Publication List
\addbibresource{../../Scholarship/scholarship.bib}

\flavor{abet}

\input{ContactInfo.abet.tex}

\begin{document}
% Turn on logging
\scrollmode

\makeheaders[c]

\makerubric{Education}

\makerubric{Employment}

\makerubric{Credentials}

\includeCheck{ProfDevelopment}{
\makerubric{ProfDevelopment}
}

\includeCheck{Conference}{
{\sffamily Recent Conference Presentations}
\input{Tables_cv/Conference.tex}
}

\includeCheck{Service}{
\makerubric{Service}
}

\makerubrichead{Recent Contributions to the Discipline}

\includeCheck{Journal}{
{\sffamily Journal Papers}
\input{Tables_cv/Journal.tex}
}

\includeCheck{Book}{
{\sffamily Books \& Book Chapters}
\input{Tables_cv/Book.tex}
}

\includeCheck{Patent}{
{\sffamily Patents}
\input{Tables_cv/Patent.tex}
}

\IfFileExists{timestamp.tex}{\input{timestamp.tex}}

\end{document}
